players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Bob is the detective and I'm the mafioso. We should vote him out."
